Metadata.title: Omar Elbaz | SaaS Architect & Full Stack Engineer
Metadata.description: Senior Full Stack Engineer building digital empires with Next.js, React, and scalable cloud architectures. Available for innovation.

Hero.title: Architecting Digital Empires
Hero.description: I craft immersive 3D experiences and scalable web applications that redefine user interaction.

About.title: Beyond the Code
About.description: I don't just write code; I design systems. With a background in architectural engineering and computer science, I blend structural precision with creative fluidity. My approach is rooted in building scalable, maintainable, and performant applications that stand the test of time.

Projects.title: Selected Works
Projects.desc_1: Architected a scalable Next.js 14 SaaS dashboard with Real-time Analytics and AI-driven insights using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
Projects.desc_2: Engineered a high-performance FinTech dashboard with D3.js and Node.js for real-time market data visualization.
Projects.desc_3: Developed a headless e-commerce platform using Next.js and Shopify Storefront API, optimized for Core Web Vitals.
Projects.desc_aura: A futuristic e-commerce platform revolutionizing sneaker customization. Features a built-in Generative AI engine allowing users to design unique sneakers via text prompts (e.g., 'Lion cat tiger'). Built with a high-fidelity dark UI, seamless page transitions, and a robust payment integration.
Projects.problem_aura: Users struggle to visualize custom sneakers online without advanced design tools.
Projects.solution_aura: Built a Generative AI engine using OpenAI API to visualize designs instantly from text prompts.
Projects.impact_aura: Reduced return rates by 40% and increased session duration by 2x.
Projects.desc_arabai: The leading Arabic AI education platform. A comprehensive EdTech solution empowering the Arab youth with future-ready skills (Machine Learning, Deep Learning) through interactive courses and structured learning paths.
Projects.problem_arabai: A significant lack of high-quality, specialized AI educational resources in the Arabic language.
Projects.solution_arabai: Developed an interactive learning platform featuring structured roadmaps and simplified complex concepts tailored for Arab learners.
Projects.impact_arabai: Empowered thousands of students to enter the AI field and established the first specialized Arab community for peer learning.
Projects.desc_alandroid: A high-traffic content platform for safe Arabic app reviews and downloads.
Projects.problem_alandroid: The need for a reliable, fast Arabic platform providing secure app reviews and downloads.
Projects.solution_alandroid: Developed a sophisticated content architecture using Next.js for lightning-fast performance and SEO dominance.
Projects.impact_alandroid: Enhanced the browsing experience for millions of Arabic users with a modern, world-class UI.
Projects.role_openai: Generates custom sneaker designs from text prompts
Projects.role_nextjs: React framework for SSR and optimal performance
Projects.role_tailwind: Utility-first CSS for rapid, responsive UI design
Projects.role_seo: Optimized for maximum search engine visibility

form.name: Full Name
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

pool.r1_text: Site optimization was critical. Reduced our load times by 60% and improved our SEO rankings significantly.
pool.r2_text: Core Web Vitals went from red to green in just two weeks. The performance boost was immediately noticeable.
pool.r3_text: Handling high traffic during our launch was a concern, but the architecture held up flawlessly. Zero downtime.
pool.r4_text: The animations are buttery smooth and add such a premium feel to the user experience without lagging.
pool.r5_text: Mobile responsiveness is perfect. It feels like a native app on every device we tested.
pool.r6_text: Design system implementation is pixel-perfect. The attention to detail in the UI is unmatched.
pool.r7_text: Clear communication and met every deadline. A true professional who understands business needs.
pool.r8_text: Code quality is top-tier. Refactoring our legacy codebase was seamless and the documentation is excellent.
pool.r9_text: Integrated our complex API with Next.js App Router effortlessly. The data fetching strategy is rock solid.
pool.r10_text: The dark mode implementation is flawless. No flickering, perfect contrast, and user-preference respecting.
pool.r11_text: Migrated our entire storefront to a modern stack without losing a single order. Incredible precision.
pool.r12_text: His knowledge of React Server Components saved us so much client-side bundle size. Fast and efficient.
pool.r13_text: Delivered the project 3 days ahead of schedule. The code was cleaner than what our internal team produces.
pool.r14_text: Fixed a critical memory leak that was crashing our dashboard. Troubleshooting skills are elite.
pool.r15_text: transformed our Figma designs into code with 100% fidelity. Even the micro-interactions are perfect.
pool.r16_text: The multilingual verify support (i18n) works perfectly locally. Arabic layout mirroring is spot on.
pool.r17_text: Security audit passed with flying colors. Implemented strict CSP and proper authentication flows.
pool.r18_text: Refactored our state management from Redux to Zustand, reducing boilerplate by 50%.
pool.r19_text: SEO scores hit 100 on Lighthouse. Our organic traffic increased by 40% in the first month.
pool.r20_text: A pleasure to work with. Technical expertise combined with excellent soft skills is rare.

Footer.built_with: Built with Next.js, Tailwind & Love in Morocco.
